title: Greg Previewed Assassin's Creed: Shadows
description:
The franchise finally goes to Japan, was it worth the wait? 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OlwitbacfMo&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0  

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
---------------------------------------------------  
YouTube: Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/kindafunny/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kindafunnyvids/
TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
